Description: Right side of round-topped limestone stela; painted relief representation of Thutmose III.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM Part 5: Plate 36 Klug, Koeniglichen Stelen (Mon Aeg 8, 2002): 186-90, Abb. 16. PM VII, p.141.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Thutmose III
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Charles Holled Smith
